summary: Hey there Nexites! This is my first official addition to the modding community, while it may not modify your skyrim experience, it will alter your desktop experience!
descriptionHtml:
[color=#FF0000][size=5][b]My new Main menu re-placer based off these pictures can be found here![/b][/size][/color] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34692][color=#FF0000][size=3]Mellophonists Scenic Skyrim Menu Re-placer with Randomizer[/size][/color][/url]

[color=#87CEFA][size=3]Hey there Nexites! This is my first official addition to the modding community, while it may not modify your skyrim experience, it will alter your desktop experience![/size][/color]

[color=#1E90FF][size=2]If you download this and like the images I would really appreciate an[/size][/color] [color=#DAA520][size=3]endorsement![/size][/color] [color=#1E90FF][size=2] If I get enough I may consider making a second version of this![/size][/color]

[color=#D3D3D3][size=3]DESCRIPTION:[/size][/color]

[color=#87CEFA][size=2]In this wallpaper pack Ill be cherry picking some of my favorite screenshots taken in game with no modification done to them. All of these screenshots were taken whilst using over 150 mods (most being ENB, environmental, immersion and graphic overhaul oriented). 

Other then that there\'s not much else to this except to have some good looking wallpapers! If you would like to use my photos in a mod of your own please visit the permissions tab.

Whelp that\'s it! I hope you all enjoy this![/size][/color]  

[color=#D3D3D3][size=3]REQUIRED FILES:[/size][/color]

[color=#FF0000]-Win Zip or any other archiving program you prefer[/color]

[color=#D3D3D3][size=3]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]

[color=#87CEFA]-Download main file 
-When file is done simply unpack files to your preferred image file 
 (Note images are loose ie: not in a folder, sorry for the inconvenience rookie mistake!) 
-whilst in your personalize window choose backgrounds 
-choose the folder you put the images in 
-hit save
-enjoy![/color]

[color=#D3D3D3][size=3]DE-INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]

[color=#87CEFA]Almost positive I don\'t need to go over this but better cover all my bases! 
-simply delete the folder and empty your recycling bin[/color]
author: Mellophonist
